verses.roman:
saṅkṣepe kahiluṅ, vistāra nā yāya kathane
vistāriyā veda-vyāsa kariba varṇane

synonyms: saṅkṣepe kahiluṅ—I have described very briefly; vistāra nā yāya kathane—it is not possible to describe them in full; vistāriyā—elaborating; veda-vyāsa—a representative of Vyāsadeva; kariba—will do; varṇane—describing.
translation: I have described the pastimes very briefly, for it is impossible for me to describe them in full. In the future, however, Vedavyāsa will describe them elaborately.
